isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - GRILLE AND GRILLE TRIM OR GRILLE SURROUND TRIM

svcproc.title: GRILLE AND GRILLE TRIM OR GRILLE SURROUND TRIM

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (Before July 1996) Grille Trim - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To remove upper, left/right side and lower grille trim pieces (Items 5, 4 and 3), first remove the grille assembly (Item 1) as described in the next part below.
Close the hood after the grille assembly (Item 1) is removed.

Reach through the grille opening and remove the 8 mounting nuts (Item 7), 4 across the top and 2 on each side, securing the upper grille trim and the right and left side grille trim pieces (Items 5 and 4) to the hood assembly (Item 2).
From the outside of the hood, remove the upper and right and left side grille trim pieces (Items 5 and 4) from the hood assembly (Item 2).
Remove the 4 hex head bolts and flat washers (Item 8) securing the lower grille trim (Item 3) to the hood assembly (Item 2), and remove the lower trim from the hood assembly.

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (Before July 1996) Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

To remove the grille assembly, use a suitable piece of wood (plywood) 1/2 inch (12.70 mm) thick and at least 10 inches (254.0 mm) wide. The length should overlap each end of grille opening about 2 inches (50.80 mm).

step1.para: Open the hood to full tilt position.
Support hood assembly from outside with a suitable stand. Protect the hood so it does not get damaged or scratched by the support.
Place the piece of wood inside of the hood grille opening. Be sure not to cover the screws retaining the grille assembly to the hood.
Carefully step over the radiator assembly and into hood grille area onto the piece of wood.

caution.para: Do not step on the grille. If you step on the grille, you will damage it.

step1.para: Remove 8 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 6), 1 each side and 3 across the top and bottom of the grille assembly (Item 1) securing it to the hood assembly (Item 2).
Carefully step from the hood assembly.
Remove hood support, then remove the grille assembly (Item 1) from the outside, through the hood grille opening.

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (Before July 1996) Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: With the hood tilted to the full open position, from the outside, place the grille assembly (Item 1) in position inside the hood assembly (Item 2).
Support the hood assembly (Item 2) with a suitable stand. Protect the hood from damage or scratches from the stand.

Place the piece of plywood used during removal in position inside of the hood grille opening. Be sure not to cover the screw holes used to retain the grille assembly (Item 1) to the hood assembly (Item 2).
Loosely install the 8 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 6), 1 each side and three across the top and bottom, securing the grill assembly (Item 1) to the hood assembly (Item 2).
Tighten all the pan head screws (Item 6) securing the grille assembly (Item 1).
Carefully step from inside the hood assembly (Item 2) area and remove the piece of wood.
Remove the hood support, close and latch the hood assembly (Item 2).

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (Before July 1996) Grille Trim - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: With the hood closed, position lower grille trim (Item 3) on the hood assembly (Item 2) and secure with 4 hex head bolts and flat washers (Item 8).
With the hood still closed, from the outside of the hood assembly (Item 2), position the upper grille trim and the right and left side grille trim pieces (Items 5 and 4) on the hood assembly.

Reach through the grille opening and install the 8 mounting nuts (Item 7), 4 across the top and 2 on each side, securing the upper grille trim and the right and left side grille trim pieces (Items 5 and 4) to the hood assembly (Item 2).
Install the grille assembly (Item 1) as described in Steps 1 through 7 above.

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. PAN HEAD SCREW AND FLAT WASHER
8. HEX HEAD BOLT AND FLAT WASHER

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (After July 1996) Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To remove the grille assembly (Item 2), have the hood assembly (Item 3) closed.
Remove 4 mounting nuts (Item 1), 2 each side, and remove the grille assembly (Item 2) from the hood assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (After July 1996) Grille Surround Trim - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To remove the grille surround trim (Item 4), have the hood assembly (Item 3) closed and latched, then remove the grille assembly (Item 2) as described in steps 1 and 2 above.
Use a heat gun to heat the grille surround trim (Item 4). Heat a small section of grille surround trim starting at the top right or left corner.

warning.para: Use a lightweight pair of gloves to protect your fingers.

step1.para: Use your fingers to pull the grille surround trim away from the hood assembly (Item 3).

Heat another small section of the grille surround trim (Item 4) and pull the grille surround trim away from the hood assembly (Item 3). Continue this procedure until the grille surround trim has been removed.

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (After July 1996) Grille Surround Trim - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To install the grille surround trim (Item 4), have the hood assembly (Item 3) closed and latched.
Prepare the grille surround surface on the hood assembly (Item 3) by cleaning thoroughly before installation of the new grille surround trim (Item 4).
Once the hood surround surface is cleaned, remove the protective covering from the back of the new grille surround trim (Item 4).

Position the new grille surround trim (Item 4) in place at the bottom of the hood assembly (Item 3) and carefully push the grille surround trim toward the hood. Once the grille surround trim is in place on the hood, press it securely against the hood around the entire grille surround trim.
Once the grille surround trim (Item 4) is securely attached to the hood assembly (Item 3), install the grille assembly (Item 2) as described in steps 1 through 3 below.

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (After July 1996) Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To install the grille assembly (Item 2), have the hood assembly (Item 3) closed and latched.
Position the grille assembly (Item 2) onto the 4 studs, 2 each side, on the hood assembly (Item 3).
Install 4 mounting nuts (Item 1), 2 each side, that secure the grille assembly (Item 2) to the hood assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.title: 9100 Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To remove the grille assembly (Item 2), have the hood assembly (Item 3) closed.
Remove 4 mounting nuts (Item 1), 2 each side, and remove grille assembly (Item 2) from the hood assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.title: 9100 Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To install the grille assembly (Item 2), have the hood assembly (Item 3) closed and latched.
Position the grille assembly (Item 2) onto the 4 studs, 2 each side, on the hood assembly (Item 3).
Install 4 mounting nuts (Item 1), 2 each side, that secure the grille assembly (Item 2) to the hood assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.title: 9300 Grille Trim - Remove

step1.para: Refer to Figure 41for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.
Remove the hood assembly. Refer to HOOD, 9300 SBA and SFA - Remove
Remove the lower upper, right and left side grille trim as follows.

Remove the lower grille trim (Item 1) by removing 2 pan head screws (Item 4) from the top flange and 2 pan head screws (Item 5) from underneath the bottom flange of the lower grille trim. Remove from inside the hood, 2 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 2), 1 each side. Then from outside the hood, remove the 2 carriage bolts (Item 3) and remove lower grille trim.
Refer to Figure 42 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

Lower the hood insulator panel (Item 1) and remove from inside the hood, 2 mounting screws and flat washers (Item 3) and 2 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 4) from the threaded studs (Item 8) and remove the hood handle (Item 2) from the upper grille trim (Item 5).
To remove the upper grille trim (Item 5), remove from the inside the hood, 4 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 6), then from outside the hood, remove the 4 carriage bolts (Item 7).
Refer to Figure 43 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

Remove from inside the hood, 2 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 1), 1 on each side of the upper grille trim (Item 2). Then from outside the hood, remove the 2 carriage bolts (Item 3) and remove upper grille trim.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 44 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To remove right and left side grille trim (Items 1 and 2) remove from inside the hood, 2 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 3), then from outside the hood, remove the 2 carriage bolts (Item 4).

figure.caption: Figure 44. 9300 Right and Left Side Grille Trim

step1.para: Refer to Figure 45 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.
Remove from inside the hood, 2 pan head screws (Item 3) from the right and left side grille trim (Item 1 and 2) and remove the side grille trim.

figure.caption: Figure 45. 9300 Right and Left Side Grille Trim

step1.para: With the lower, upper, right and left side grille trim removed, remove the grille insert assembly, upper recirculation seal/mounting bracket, right and left side recirculation seals/mounting bracket, grille opening brace, both sides, and lower grille bracket as follows.

Remove the upper recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Items 1 and 2, Figure 46) by removing, from inside the hood, 3 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 3, Figure 46) across the top of the grille opening. Then from outside the hood, remove 2 carriage bolts and star washers (Item 1, Figure 47) from the grille opening brace (Item 3, Figure 47) and the hood; also remove the center carriage bolt (Item 2, Figure 47).

Remove, from inside the hood, 2 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 1, Figure 48), at the center of the side recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Item 2, Figure 48), 1 each side, passenger side shown. Then from outside the hood, remove the center carriage bolt (Item 4, Figure 47) from each side of the grille insert assembly (Item 5, Figure 47).
Refer to Figure 49 for the following Items in parentheses.

To remove the grille insert assembly (Item 3), remove from inside the hood, 3 lock nuts and flat washers (Item 1) across the bottom of the grille opening. Then from outside the hood, remove the right and left side carriage bolts (Item 2) from the grille insert assembly and lower grille bracket (Item 4). Remove the center carriage bolt (Item 5) and spacer (Item 6) and remove the grille insert assembly.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. CARRIAGE BOLT, 1/4-20 X 1-1/2 INCHES AND STAR WASHER

step1.para: Refer to Figure 50 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.
Remove the upper hex bolts, flat washers and lock nuts (Item 1) at each side recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Item 3) and remove both grille opening braces (Item 4).
Then remove the lower hex bolts, flat washers and lock nut (Item 2) at each side recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Item 3) and remove them.
To remove the lower grille bracket (Item 5), remove 2 hex bolts and lock nuts and 4 flat washers (Items 6 and 7).

figure.caption: Figure 50. 9300 Grille Opening Brace and Lower Grille Bracket

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT, 1/4-20 X 1-1/2 INCHES, FLAT WASHER AND LOCK NUT (UPPER)
2. HEX BOLT, 1/4-20 X 1-1/2 INCHES, FLAT WASHER AND LOCK NUT (LOWER)
6. HEX BOLT, 1/4-20 X 1-1/2 INCHES AND FLAT WASHER

svcsubproc.title: 9300 Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 50 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Position the lower grille bracket (Item 5) on the bottom of the hood assembly, and from outside the hood, install the 2 hex bolts and flat washers (Item 6). then from inside the hood, install the flat washers and lock nuts (Item 7). Tighten to 90 to 100 in-lbs. (10 to 11 Nm).
Refer to Figure 51 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

Position side recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Item 1), right side shown, in place and from outside the hood, install the lower hex bolt and flat washer (Item 2). Then from inside the hood, install the flat washer and lock nut (Item 3). Tighten to finger tight.

Position grille opening brace (Item 4), right side shown, inside the side recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Item 1) and from outside the hood, install the hex bolt and flat washer (Item 5). Then from inside the hood, install flat washer and lock nut (Item 6). Tighten to finger tight.

figure.caption: Figure 51. 9300 Side Recirculation Seal and Grille Opening Brace

step1.para: Repeat steps 2 and 3 to install left side recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Item 3, Figure 50) and grille opening brace (Item 4, Figure 50).

Position the grille insert assembly (Item 5, Figure 47) on the outside of the hood and install the center carriage bolts (Item, 4, Figure 47), 1 each side. Then from inside the hood, install the flat washers and lock nuts (Item 1, Figure 48) at the center carriage bolt, both sides. Tighten to finger tight.

Position the grille insert assembly (Item 3, Figure 49) at the lower grille bracket (Item 4, Figure 49), and from outside the hood, install the right and left side carriage bolts (Item 2, Figure 49). Also install the center carriage bolt (Item 5, Figure 49) through the grille, spacer (Item 6, Figure 49) and lower grille bracket, then from inside the hood, install flat washers and lock nuts (Item 1, Figure 49). Tighten to finger tight.

Position the grille insert assembly (Item 5, Figure 47) at the top hood mounting holes, and from outside the hood, install the 2 carriage bolts (Item 1, Figure 47) through the grille insert assembly, hood, star washer (Item 1, Figure 47), grille opening brace (Item 3, Figure 47) and upper recirculation seal/mounting bracket (Items 1 and 2, Figure 46). Also install the center carriage bolt (Item 2, Figure 47). Then from inside the hood, install the 3 flat washers and lock nuts (Item 3, Figure 46).

Tighten hex bolts and lock nuts (Items 1 and 2, Figure 50) on both side recirculation seal/mounting brackets (Item 3, Figure 50) and 8 carriage bolts and lock nuts securing the grille insert assembly. Tighten to 90 to 100 in-lbs. (10 to 11 Nm).

Position the right and left side grille trim (Items 1 and 2, Figure 45) in place and install 2 pan head screws (Item 3, Figure 45), from outside the hood. Install the 2 carriage bolts (Item 4, Figure 44), then from inside hood, install flat washers and lock nuts (Item 3, Figure 44), both sides. Tighten to 70 to 80 in-lbs. (8 to 9 Nm).

Position upper grille trim (Item 5, Figure 42) in place, and from outside hood, install the 4 carriage bolts (Item 7, Figure 42) across the top. From inside the hood, install flat washers and lock nuts (Item 6, Figure 42). From outside the hood, install 2 carriage bolts (Item 3, Figure 43), 1 each side of the upper grille trim (Item 2, Figure 43). From inside the hood, install the flat washers and lock nuts (Item 1, Figure 43), both sides. Tighten to 70 to 80 in-lbs. (8 to 9 Nm).

Position the lower grille trim (Item 1, Figure 41) in place and install the 2 pan head screws (Item 4, Figure 41) on the top flange and the 2 pan head screws (Item 5, Figure 41) on the underside of the bottom flange of the lower grille trim. From outside the hood, install the 2 carriage bolts (Item 3, Figure 41), 1 each side; then from inside the hood, install the flat washers and lock nuts (Item 2, Figure 41), both sides. Tighten to 70 to 80 in-lbs. (8 to 9 Nm).

Position the hood handle (Item 2, Figure 42) on the upper grille trim, and from inside the hood, install the 2 mounting screws and flat washers (Item 3, Figure 42). Then install the 2 flat washers and lock nuts (Item 4, Figure 42) on the threaded studs. Exercise care at installation to prevent scratching the upper grille trim. Position the hood insulator panel (Item 1, Figure 42) back in place and secure it to the hood.
Install the hood on the chassis, refer to HOOD, 9300 SBA and SFA - Install.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA (Before April 1992) Grille Trim - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove the grille trim (Item 1) and radiator guard (Item 7) from the left and right grille mounting supports (Items 6 and 8) by removing, 3 each side, pan head screws, lockwashers, and flat washers (Items 2, 3 and 4).

Remove the grille trim (Item 1) from the radiator guard (Item 7) by removing 4 pan head screws, lockwashers, flat washers and hex nuts (Items 2, 3, 4, and 9) from the bottom edge of the grille trim and radiator guard assembly
Pull away the upper edge of the radiator guard (Item 7) where it is affixed with sealing tape (Item 5) and remove it from the grille trim (Item 1).
If replacing the grille trim (Item 1), remove the product name plate (Item 10).

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA (Before April 1992) Grille Trim - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: If removed, or installing new grille trim (Item 1), install the product name plate (Item 10).

Position the grille trim on the radiator guard (Item 7) and install 4 pan head screws, lockwashers, flat washers and hex nuts (Items 2, 3, 4, and 9) to the bottom edge of the grille trim and radiator guard assembly.
Secure upper edge of radiator guard in place with sealing tape (Item 5).
Install the grille trim and radiator guard assembly (Items 1 and 7) to the left and right grille mounting supports (Items 6 and 8) with, 3 each side, pan head screws, lockwashers and flat washers.

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. SEALING TAPE, 1/4 INCH THICK X 1/2 INCH

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA (After April 1992) Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.
Remove 8 retaining screws (Item 2), 3 each side and 1 each at the top and bottom, then remove the grille (Item 3) from grille mounting brackets (Item 1).
If replacing the grille (Item 3), remove the product name plate (Item 4).

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA (After April 1992) Grille Trim - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To remove the grille trim (Item 5), first remove the grille assembly (Item 3) as described in Steps 1 through 3 above.
Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.
Drill out rivets (Item 6) from the top and sides of the grille trim (Item 5) securing the grille trim to the hood/fender assembly (Item 7). Remove the grille trim.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA (After April 1992) Grille Trim - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: With the hood raised to the full open position, install the grille trim (Item 5) as follows.
Place the grille trim on the hood/fender assembly (Item 7) and install new rivets securing the grille trim onto the hood/fender assembly.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA (After April 1992 Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: If removed, install the grille trim before installing the grille (Item 3); refer to 5000 SFA Grille Trim - Install as described in Steps 1 and 2 above.
If removed, or installing a new grille, install the product name plate (Item 4) on the grille.
Tilt the hood to the full open position.
Position the grille in place on the grille mounting brackets (Item 1) and secure with the 8 retaining screws, 3 each side and 1 each at the top and bottom.
Close and latch the hood assembly on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Fiberglass Tilt Hood, Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.
Remove 10 hex locknuts and lockwashers from the carriage bolts (Item 10), 1 each side and 4 on the top and bottom, and remove the grille assembly (Item 8) from the radiator guard (Item 7).
If replacing the grille assembly, remove the product name plate (Item 9).

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Fiberglass Tilt Hood, Grille Trim - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: To remove the grill trim (Items 2, 3, and 4), first remove the grille assembly (Item 8) as described in Steps 1 through 3 above.
With the hood raised to the full open position, remove the grille trim as follows.

Remove self-threading bolts or studs and nuts (Item 5), 4 each top and bottom, securing the top and bottom grille trim (Items 2 and 4) to the tilt hood assembly (Item 1). Remove the top and bottom grille trim.
Remove hex head bolts and flat washers (Item 6), 2 each side, securing the right and left side grille trim (Item 3) to the tilt hood assembly (Item 1). Remove the side grille trim.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Fiberglass Tilt Hood, Grille Trim - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: With the hood raised to the full open position, install the grille trim as follows.

Position the right and left side grille trim (Item 3) on the tilt hood assembly (Item 1). Install the hex head bolts and flat washers (Item 6), 2 each side, securing the side grille trim to the hood assembly.

Position the top and bottom grille trim (Items 2 and 4) on the tilt hood assembly. Install self-threading bolts or studs and nuts, 4 each top and bottom, securing the top and bottom trim to the hood assembly.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Fiberglass Tilt Hood, Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: If removed, or installing a new grille, install the product name plate (Item 9) on the grille.
With the hood raised to the full open position, install the grille (Item 8) as follows.

If removed, install 10 carriage bolts (Item 10) from the rear through the radiator guard (Item 7), and secure with the push-on spring nuts. Position the grille assembly over the carriage bolts and secure with lockwashers and hex locknuts.

figure.caption: Figure 54. 5000 SBA (With Fiberglass Tilt Hood) Grille Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. SELF-THREADING BOLT OR STUD AND NUT (4 EACH TOP AND BOTTOM)
6. HEX HEAD BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND "U" NUT (2 EACH SIDE)
10. SQUARE NECK CARRIAGE BOLT, PUSH-ON SPRING NUT, LOCKWASHER AND HEX LOCKNUT

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood, Grille - Remove

step1.para: Refer to Figure 55 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.
To remove the grille assembly (Item 4), first remove the hood assembly; refer to 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Remove.
Detach the grille assembly (Item 4) or shutters, if so equipped, from the front flanges of the left and right radiator/grille brackets (Item 2) by removing 5 pan head screws (Item 1) from each side.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 56 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove 4 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 13) from each side that secure the left and right radiator/grille brackets (Items 11 and 14) to the radiator shell assembly (Item 10).

Remove 2 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 8), 1 from each side, that secure the left and right shell/radiator bracket assemblies (Items 6 and 15) to the hood filler panel braces (Item 7, View Arrow A).
Remove 5 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 5) from each side that secure the radiator shell assembly (Item 10) to the left and right shell/radiator bracket assemblies (Item 6 and 15).
Remove the radiator shell assembly (Item 10).

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood, Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 56 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Position radiator shell assembly (Item 10) in front of the radiator assembly (Item 3).
Fasten radiator shell assembly (Item 10) to the left and right shell/radiator bracket assemblies (Items 6 and 15) with bolts and lockwashers (Item 5), 5 each side.
Then fasten the left and right shell/radiator bracket assemblies to the hood filler panel braces (Item 7, View Arrow A) with 2 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 8), 1 each side.
Fasten left and right radiator/grille brackets (Items 11 and 14) to the radiator shell assembly with hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 13), 4 each side.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 55 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Attach the grille assembly (Item 4) or shutters, if so equipped, to the front flanges of the left and right radiator/grille brackets (Item 2) with pan head screws (Item 1), 5 each side.
Install the hood assembly; refer to 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Install.

figure.caption: Figure 55. 5000 SBA (With Butterfly Hood) Grille Assembly
Figure 56. 5000 SBA (With Butterfly Hood) Radiator Assembly
